Package univpm.esame.ProgettoOOP.services

Class AllFiles

java.lang.Object
univpm.esame.ProgettoOOP.services.AllFiles
@Service public class AllFiles extends Object
The class calls the Dropbox API /list_folder and can either return all or some files
Author:
Francisco Messina, Amine Kchelfi

      public ArrayList<AbstractObject> getFilteredFiles​(ArrayList<AbstractObject> allFilesFiltered, String fullName) throws FileNotFoundException, IncorrectFormatException, TypeNotRecognisedException
      The method filters allFiles either by their extension or name
